What I'm studying

Fullstack web developer open source, Nackademin

YH | 2 years | 24 weeks internship | Stockholm, Sweden

Web developer full stack open source code - program gives a broad programming competence in both backend and frontend. It gives the ability to develop interactive web applications in, among others, NodeJS, PHP and JavaScript for complex environments with regard to performance and large amounts of data. You will also be able to develop modern applications using HTML, CSS and various JavaScript libraries. The training Web developer full stack open source code gives you knowledge of the specific development environments, program languages ​​and guidelines that the web requires today. In addition to this, you will also learn to collaborate in agile projects, from coding to implementation. You will be from working in a solution-oriented way, both independently and in a development team. The training web developer full stack open source is conducted partly in English as it is the leading international language in IT and it is important that you as a developer can communicate solutions and take on job descriptions in English and work with professional software and tools that are often in English. Studying at Nackademin means that you study for one year and not one subject. This must be done by you as a student discipline, great drive and personal responsibility for your studies. You are responsible for your studies and we give you the conditions to succeed! The education is conducted full time but some days are set for self-study.
